attributes.action: raise the level at which people start to pay income tax to £8000 a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment lots of people earning money and paying income tax also claim benefits.Its a waste of resources to take money from people and then pay them momney back to enable them to live.Many people find the proceedures to much and do not get the benifits to which they are entitled whilst others cheat the system.The lowest earners often pay a far higher % of their income in tax.The government could make up loss of income by increasing the rate for higher rate tax payers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
